ECSchema.description: Main schema for the physical modeling of elements specifically used in Bridges.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement that is usually used to transmit loads from a bridge's superstructure to substructure, and usually allowing movement (displacement or rotation) in one or more degrees of freedom.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of Bearing rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:Bearing is an instance of the defined brphys:BearingType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement modeling the portion of a beam or structural member through which loads and forces are transmitted.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of Bearing-seat rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:BearingSeat is an instance of the defined brphys:BearingSeatType.
